plot: In this espionage adventure, an Interpol agent must find a valuable stolen microchip. Soon he finds himself involved with beautiful women, fast cars, and danger on the exciting streets of Paris and New York.
title: The Scorpio Factor
plot_es: In this espionage adventure, an Interpol agent must find a valuable stolen microchip. Soon he finds himself involved with beautiful women, fast cars, and danger on the exciting streets of Paris and New York.
plot_en: In this espionage adventure, an Interpol agent must find a valuable stolen microchip. Soon he finds himself involved with beautiful women, fast cars, and danger on the exciting streets of Paris and New York.
